trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objetos em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRowCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe GridViewRowCollection é usada para armazenar e gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objetos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle é representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle armazena todas as suas linhas de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRowCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: A classe GridViewRowCollection dá suporte a várias maneiras de acessar os itens na coleção:-Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A>indexador para recuperar diretamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto em um índice com base em zero específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para recuperar um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar os itens na coleção em uma <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, que pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número total de itens na coleção, use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>propriedade</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>classe usando especificado <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object should contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objeto deve conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objetos com o qual preencher a coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> objeto que contém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objetos com a qual inicializar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto, começando no índice especificado no <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, iniciando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, em seguida, pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você deve usar um com base em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>de objeto para o `array` parâmetro.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro índice especificado na <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto para receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Count para determinar o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada ao fazer a iteração pela coleção para determinar o limite superior da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada para determinar se uma coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para obter um enumerador que pode ser iterado pelo linearmente para acessar cada item em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o item na posição atual do enumerador, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para mover o enumerador como sua posição inicial, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando você inicialmente obter o enumerador ou usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover o enumerador para o primeiro item na coleção, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item that is represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item que é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> implementado o objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the rows in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as linhas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsReadOnly property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade IsReadOnly para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto pode ser modificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified in all cases.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto pode ser modificado em todos os casos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"></xref> object is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto for sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSynchronized property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade IsSynchronized para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto é thread-safe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto não é thread-safe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto da coleção no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto a ser recuperado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the SyncRoot property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade SyncRoot para obter um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>objeto propriamente dito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade SyncRoot, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>instância é convertida para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que é o destino dos elementos copiados a partir de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in a <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero em uma <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto no qual a cópia começa.
